title: Club bug/glitch
body:
I'm the owner of a club called The Exiled Vikings but I can't see my club neither do I have the club tag, which is VKNGS. On the other people of the club, they see me as the leader but not on my screen, help please!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Thanks for those details, it helped me find your club!  I gave it a boop so everything should be good to go the next time you log on.  Let me know!

I have the same problem, I am the club owner and the club name is "TheStarRabbits" and club tag "TSRR".
Would like som help.
club idkwhatever tag is (S!!CK) boop me please
i have the same problem.I am the owner of a club and when i open the club tab its says im not the owner of any club and no one can invite me in their club.
What's the name and tag of your club?  Happy to check!
the club name is xCHATx and the tag M1nou
Good to go!  Make sure to relog to apply the update.
club idkwhatever tag is (S!!CK) same thing boop me please!
